titleStmt.title: The tragœdy of Othello, the Moore of Venice As it hath beene diuerse times acted at the Globe, and at the Black-Friers, by his Maiesties Seruants. Written by VVilliam Shakespeare.
Othello
titleStmt.author: Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by N[icholas] O[kes] for Thomas Walkley, and are to be sold at his shop, at the Eagle and Child, in Brittans Bursse,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The tragedy of Othello the Moore of Venice.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
